nodes.title: Where does it come from
nodes.excerpt: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. nodes.title: Why do we use it
nodes.excerpt: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
